name: AWSCloudFormationInterfaceParameterGroup
description: ParameterGroup is a property of the AWS::CloudFormation::Interface resource that defines a parameter group and the parameters to include in the group.

properties.name: Label
properties.description: A name for the parameter group.

properties.name: Parameters
properties.description: A list of case-sensitive parameter logical IDs to include in the group. Parameters must already be defined in the Parameters section of the template. A parameter can be included in only one parameter group.
